Background
Background

• Many biological functions are carried out by large, multi- protein assemblies – DNA transcriptional regulation – Signal transduction – Nuclear pore complex – Membrane-protein trafficking – Viral entry and release
• Many biological functions are
carried out by large, multi-
protein assemblies
– DNA transcriptional regulation
– Signal transduction
– Nuclear pore complex
– Membrane-protein trafficking
– Viral entry and release

Motivation

Understanding structure and dynamics
of multi-protein assemblies
